string.name: terminal_text
string.b: Terminal to check remote access obtained. \n
string.i:
" 1. Obtain access with Grant remote access. 
" 	 " 2. Click on Find paired devices in the Ultrasense controller App. 
" 	 " 3. Click on start in the Ultrasense controller App. 
" 	 " 4. Click on Start App as Remote in this app. 
"
